transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. Many people are leaving the Church. I think this is because the Church does not accept many things. 

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues to many people. The Church's views are very old. 

If the Church was more modern, it would not lose so many followers. Many people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

If you believe in abortion, you might not feel comfortable in a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think women can be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be free to marry who they love.  A person's sexual orientation is part of who they are. They do not choose it. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. They say there is no good reason not to allow it.

Some people worry that gay couples are a threat to families. But they say it is different. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples, like property rights and health care.

If a gay partner is sick, they cannot visit or make medical decisions for their partner in the hospital. 

Studies show gay couples have happy relationships, just like straight couples.

Gay couples are not asking to be married in a church. They want a legal marriage certificate.

Some people say it is against their religion. But others say the government should not be involved in religion.

Gay couples want the same rights as everyone else. They want to be treated equally.

Some worry about how gay couples will raise children. But studies show children of gay couples do well.

It is important to remember that gay couples are just like straight couples in many ways. They love each other and want to build a life together.

The government should protect the rights of all people, including gay couples.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can have good uses for health.  

Many medicines people use are illegal without a doctor's order. This includes oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocet. These drugs are strong. Doctors use them to help people.  

People use marijuana for many reasons. Some use it to feel good. Others use it to help with pain. It is important to use drugs safely. 

Alcohol is legal but can be bad if used too much. Marijuana can also be bad if used too much.  

I think marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful how we start. We should not make it legal all at once.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If we change how people think about marijuana, they may use it safely.

The church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before.  

When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there every week.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some people even come straight from the beach in their swimsuits.  

At the morning masses, people wear jeans and khakis. It used to be that everyone dressed up. Now, it is more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed.

As for other things, I don't know much about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations against priests, I don't think these could have been prevented even if priests were allowed to marry.

Some married men become pedophiles. It is about the person, not their marriage status. Becoming a priest is a choice.

There are other religions where priests can marry. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they could choose a different religion.

I think pedophilia is genetic. People are born with these tendencies. It is not something they learn. A marriage cannot hide this.

I am upset about the Iraq war. After September 11th, many people felt scared. The Bush administration said Iraq was bad and connected to the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had dangerous weapons. This is not true. I think the Bush administration lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to people.

I think the Bush administration does not care about the Constitution. They want to be in control. The president wanted to go to war. His father's administration fought with Saddam Hussein. The president wanted to control Iraq's oil.

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, Iraq could become very dangerous. A civil war could start. The UN and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. This might cause more problems. Iraq should be in control of its own government.

The government in Iraq is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. Many groups want control. One group, led by Sadr, has many seats in the government. There are many problems.

I feel confused about the war in Iraq. It seems like it began as a way to punish Iraq for 9/11, but now it feels pointless. We are trying to build a democracy there, but it is a slow process. 

I worry that if we leave, Iraq will fall into chaos. But staying there also makes people angry and could make things worse. 

I also worry that the war is making our country look bad. It's like the Vietnam War, which many people consider a mistake. I feel bad for President Bush because this war might hurt his reputation. 

Many of my friends or family have children fighting in Iraq. I want them to be safe. But I also worry about the Iraqi people. They have suffered a lot. 

I don't know if there is a good solution. It seems like this war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make [the act] legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  I think trying to make laws about this is against what the constitution says.  It is like trying to say the government knows better than the church.  

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's belief over another. Many Catholics and Christians are against [the act]. But I think the government should not decide what churches can and cannot say is wrong.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different religions in the United States. Even though some people want to change the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would be the only change that limits people, not the government.

I do not think the government should be involved in this. The person pushing for this change only wants to limit [the act] because of his own beliefs.  He is picking one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. 

I do not see why this change is needed. It will not help or hurt the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complex issue. 

I do not think the government was honest with the people about why we went to war. I believe they tried to link the war to the September 11th attacks, even though they were not really connected. The government used the fear and anger after September 11th to push for the invasion. The war began in 2003, two years after the attacks.

I am against war, especially preemptive strikes. I think the Iraq War is similar to the Vietnam War, and we should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers have died in Iraq, and it has been a devastating loss.

The government removed the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. They did not realize the chaos and instability that would follow. The United States is trying to help build a democracy in Iraq, but it is a very difficult process.

It is like what happened in Vietnam. We tried to remove communists and promote democracy, but it was a long and hard fight. We cannot expect quick victories in these situations.

The government should have been better prepared for the challenges of war. We should have thought about all the possible outcomes before going in. The war has been going on for many years, and many American troops are still dying. We are still trying to train Iraqi forces to protect their own country.

The US government made it seem like the war would be short and successful, but it has been anything but. Building a democracy takes time and effort. It took a long time for the United States to become a strong democracy, with many struggles and conflicts along the way.

The US government should have been more honest with the people about the difficulties of war and the long-term commitment required.

It is hard to decide what to do now. We have been in Iraq for so long that leaving seems wrong. But the cost in lives and money is very high. We need to find a way to end the war peacefully and help Iraq build a stable future.

It is also important to consider why we went to Iraq in the first place. We said it was about weapons of mass destruction, but those were never found. We know that other countries, like North Korea, have weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.

It seems like the real reason for the war was oil.

I hope the war will end soon and there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. It is something that science is showing us is likely biological, not just a social thing.  So, it seems unfair to take away rights from people because of something they cannot control. I think it is wrong.

I believe that government should not be involved in personal matters like this. It is a personal matter, a family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs, go to the store, and live their lives. 

I think it is wrong for the government to decide who can marry. People should be free to choose who they love.

I have read that being gay may be related to biology. Some studies suggest it is partly in your genes.  This is different from things like growing up in a family with many siblings and no father, which does not make someone gay.

Besides the basic fairness of it, I think marriage should be a private matter. A man and a woman can get married without telling anyone. But gay couples face more problems. Their marriage makes news, even if they just want to be happy. It should not be a public issue.

The internet is a public place.  When you put something on the internet, anyone can see it. As an R.A., I have seen this.  If you post something online, people will see it and judge you. If you talk about hurting people or violence, someone will tell someone else. You can't put that out there. The internet is for everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see their messages.

The school may not get the message directly, but someone will tell them. They have to act if someone might be in danger. They can't ignore it. What if something bad happens?

It is hard to know what is serious and what is not. Sometimes people joke online, but it can be dangerous. For example, at my school, a situation happened where someone heard something. They told the school, and the school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made people worried. The person may have meant it as a joke, but it seemed serious.

When you share things online, you lose your privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't post it. You can't control what people think. 

School officials should not be friends with their students on social media. They should not look through their Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about something dangerous, they have to take it seriously.

They should not monitor phone calls or text messages unless they have a reason. If someone tells them about something, they have to act.

I think the war has lasted too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country have democracy. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. I also think the reasons for going to war were not good. It may have been about President Bush’s father’s problems with Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is a good reason. But now, I think the reason is unclear. It is like we fight just to keep fighting.

We showed our power in the first months. Now, the war has lasted for years. It is too long.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is good. But I think our reason for fighting has changed. 

The war should end. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should fix these problems instead of fighting.

We spend billions of dollars on war. This money could help people here. We need money for schools, roads, and health care.

We should help our own people instead of fighting a war that we do not need to be in.

Can I ask a question to make sure I understand?

It seems someone saw something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening. Is that right?

Okay.

I do not think looking at someone's internet profile is bad. If you put information on the internet, many people can see it.

On Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But, if you are friends, you give them permission to see it.

Anytime you put information online, many people might see it. If someone saw something helpful and stopped a bad thing, that is good.

It is hard to have someone always watching everyone's profiles to prevent problems. It would be wrong to only watch "bad" students.

It all depends on the situation. Was someone randomly looking or searching for something specific? I do not know.

I have a Facebook account. It worries me that people I do not know can see information about me. I saw a story about a man who easily found information about a girl online and talked to her. I would never meet someone like that.

Some people in my class message me on instant messenger, but I do not recognize their names. It is strange because they know my interests and schedule.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but I also want to connect with friends. It is hard to balance privacy and connection.

I only accept friends I know, but you never know who can see information.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. It seemed strange to me. I do not know how they can tell students what websites they can use.

I am against the Iraq War. Many people agree with me.  Most polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people around the world think it was a bad idea. This includes people in Iraq and even U.S. soldiers who are there. The war was a mistake from the start and leaving will be hard too.

There is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our way of life is not the same. The current government does not understand this. They think they can bring democracy to a place where it does not fit. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the bad things that might happen before we invaded Iraq.

Pulling out of Iraq will be difficult, but staying is also bad. The government has reasons for staying, but I do not agree.

I think we should leave as soon as possible. I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want us to leave within a year. They are the people we are trying to help, and they want us to go. Maybe they know best. If we ask them and they say we should leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong. At least we tried to listen to them.

Leaving will not make us heroes, but it will be better than what we are doing now.

I think gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. It depends on the type of work. 

For example, women may face a "glass ceiling." This means they may not be promoted to high-level jobs, even if they are qualified. This is because society has traditionally seen men as leaders in business.

Men can also face discrimination. For example, stay-at-home dads may be looked down on because society expects men to be the main breadwinners. 

In the fashion industry, men may be less respected, even if they are talented. This is because fashion is often seen as a feminine field.

Change takes time, but progress is being made.

More women are becoming CEOs and stay-at-home dads are becoming more accepted.  

People are starting to see that success is not limited by gender.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious, like a traffic ticket. It is not a crime like it used to be. This means people will not be arrested. They will just get a ticket.

Many people are worried about the future. Even if marijuana is not a crime, some jobs still might not hire people who have been cited for it.

This change saves the government money. It costs a lot to arrest, jail, and try people. 

Some places do not want to change the law because they think marijuana is bad. But in places where people are more open to change, it is okay. This money can be used for schools, older people, and people without homes.

Marijuana should not be sold everywhere. People should be careful. 

Some people worry about marijuana being sold in stores like cigarettes. People would smoke it everywhere. It is not yet normal to smoke marijuana. It can be awkward.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have bad effects on a person's life. Both have bad effects, but people react differently. Some people can use things in moderation, while others cannot.

I say yes.
Many things in the Catholic Church are old. 
It is good to follow traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules carefully.
Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics.
They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. 
My mom was a Catholic.
They could not marry in the Catholic Church.
This is not being kind to other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching.
But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them.
I feel like Catholic teachings tell you to do things, but how the Church acts goes against these teachings.
It is old-fashioned and they do not change.

I do not think this would change much.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think this would stop bad priests.
It is a different problem.

People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.
Allowing priests to marry would not stop this.

I am still thinking about this topic. I do not know if either side is right or wrong. This is a difficult problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. If marriage is a religious thing, the government should not care. People would not get special treatment from the government if they were baptized.

If two people are united, that is all that matters. The government should not care about the type of union.

If all states agree on a law, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban same-sex marriage is wrong. The constitution should not be changed for this.

It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home.

Being gay is a hard thing for me to understand.

I have gay friends.

I do not agree with this way of life.

But I think gay people should have the same rights.

I think each state should decide if gay marriage is legal.

I do not think it should be a big national problem.

Some states are run by Democrats.

Many states are run by Republicans.

Democrats like gay marriage.

If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel.

You chose to live there.

So you should respect their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people.

So I think gay marriage should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think each state should decide if they want gay marriage.

I do not think the President should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.

I think some things should be up to each state.

The President cannot live in every state.

He should not tell each state how to run itself.

I think a new President might change the law.

It will keep going back and forth.

It is better to let each state decide.

They will have to live with the decision.

My Space is a public thing. It is like a bulletin board for people to see.

If you post something on My Space, you must know that many people will see it, including school officials. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can still access it at home.

If the school officials can stop a school shooting, they have the right to see what is on My Space. Their job is to keep students safe.

However, if they use My Space just to find students doing things they are not allowed to do, that is an invasion of privacy.  

It is easier to express yourself in writing. I am careful about what I post online because I know it can come back to haunt me. Everything on the internet stays there forever.

When you are a student, you should not expect privacy on public websites.

If school officials find something on My Space that prevents a bad thing from happening, like a school shooting, then it is okay. They are trying to make the school a safe place.

Parents want to know their children are safe at school. School officials need to do what they can to keep students safe.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I wanted revenge. But now I am against it. We did not plan well.

We went in unprepared. It backfired. The people there fight each other. They do not need us. I do not care about them.

We went in looking for revenge. President Bush went in because people wanted it. He could not let them get away with it.

But, we did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. We were angry, not thinking clearly.

We did not create order. There was no unity. I do not think we can change them. They will always fight.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. We are hurting ourselves. We should leave.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. Many people are leaving the Church. I think this is because the Church does not accept many things. 

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues to many people. The Church's views are very old. 

If the Church was more modern, it would not lose so many followers. Many people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

If you believe in abortion, you might not feel comfortable in a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think women can be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be free to marry who they love.  A person's sexual orientation is part of who they are. They do not choose it. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. They say there is no good reason not to allow it.

Some people worry that gay couples are a threat to families. But they say it is different. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples, like property rights and health care.

If a gay partner is sick, they cannot visit or make medical decisions for their partner in the hospital. 

Studies show gay couples have happy relationships, just like straight couples.

Gay couples are not asking to be married in a church. They want a legal marriage certificate.

Some people say it is against their religion. But others say the government should not be involved in religion.

Gay couples want the same rights as everyone else. They want to be treated equally.

Some worry about how gay couples will raise children. But studies show children of gay couples do well.

It is important to remember that gay couples are just like straight couples in many ways. They love each other and want to build a life together.

The government should protect the rights of all people, including gay couples.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can have good uses for health.  

Many medicines people use are illegal without a doctor's order. This includes oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocet. These drugs are strong. Doctors use them to help people.  

People use marijuana for many reasons. Some use it to feel good. Others use it to help with pain. It is important to use drugs safely. 

Alcohol is legal but can be bad if used too much. Marijuana can also be bad if used too much.  

I think marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful how we start. We should not make it legal all at once.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If we change how people think about marijuana, they may use it safely.

The church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before.  

When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there every week.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some people even come straight from the beach in their swimsuits.  

At the morning masses, people wear jeans and khakis. It used to be that everyone dressed up. Now, it is more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed.

As for other things, I don't know much about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations against priests, I don't think these could have been prevented even if priests were allowed to marry.

Some married men become pedophiles. It is about the person, not their marriage status. Becoming a priest is a choice.

There are other religions where priests can marry. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they could choose a different religion.

I think pedophilia is genetic. People are born with these tendencies. It is not something they learn. A marriage cannot hide this.

I am upset about the Iraq war. After September 11th, many people felt scared. The Bush administration said Iraq was bad and connected to the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had dangerous weapons. This is not true. I think the Bush administration lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to people.

I think the Bush administration does not care about the Constitution. They want to be in control. The president wanted to go to war. His father's administration fought with Saddam Hussein. The president wanted to control Iraq's oil.

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, Iraq could become very dangerous. A civil war could start. The UN and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. This might cause more problems. Iraq should be in control of its own government.

The government in Iraq is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. Many groups want control. One group, led by Sadr, has many seats in the government. There are many problems.

I feel confused about the war in Iraq. It seems like it began as a way to punish Iraq for 9/11, but now it feels pointless. We are trying to build a democracy there, but it is a slow process. 

I worry that if we leave, Iraq will fall into chaos. But staying there also makes people angry and could make things worse. 

I also worry that the war is making our country look bad. It's like the Vietnam War, which many people consider a mistake. I feel bad for President Bush because this war might hurt his reputation. 

Many of my friends or family have children fighting in Iraq. I want them to be safe. But I also worry about the Iraqi people. They have suffered a lot. 

I don't know if there is a good solution. It seems like this war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make [the act] legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  I think trying to make laws about this is against what the constitution says.  It is like trying to say the government knows better than the church.  

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's belief over another. Many Catholics and Christians are against [the act]. But I think the government should not decide what churches can and cannot say is wrong.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different religions in the United States. Even though some people want to change the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would be the only change that limits people, not the government.

I do not think the government should be involved in this. The person pushing for this change only wants to limit [the act] because of his own beliefs.  He is picking one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. 

I do not see why this change is needed. It will not help or hurt the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complex issue. 

I do not think the government was honest with the people about why we went to war. I believe they tried to link the war to the September 11th attacks, even though they were not really connected. The government used the fear and anger after September 11th to push for the invasion. The war began in 2003, two years after the attacks.

I am against war, especially preemptive strikes. I think the Iraq War is similar to the Vietnam War, and we should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers have died in Iraq, and it has been a devastating loss.

The government removed the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. They did not realize the chaos and instability that would follow. The United States is trying to help build a democracy in Iraq, but it is a very difficult process.

It is like what happened in Vietnam. We tried to remove communists and promote democracy, but it was a long and hard fight. We cannot expect quick victories in these situations.

The government should have been better prepared for the challenges of war. We should have thought about all the possible outcomes before going in. The war has been going on for many years, and many American troops are still dying. We are still trying to train Iraqi forces to protect their own country.

The US government made it seem like the war would be short and successful, but it has been anything but. Building a democracy takes time and effort. It took a long time for the United States to become a strong democracy, with many struggles and conflicts along the way.

The US government should have been more honest with the people about the difficulties of war and the long-term commitment required.

It is hard to decide what to do now. We have been in Iraq for so long that leaving seems wrong. But the cost in lives and money is very high. We need to find a way to end the war peacefully and help Iraq build a stable future.

It is also important to consider why we went to Iraq in the first place. We said it was about weapons of mass destruction, but those were never found. We know that other countries, like North Korea, have weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.

It seems like the real reason for the war was oil.

I hope the war will end soon and there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. It is something that science is showing us is likely biological, not just a social thing.  So, it seems unfair to take away rights from people because of something they cannot control. I think it is wrong.

I believe that government should not be involved in personal matters like this. It is a personal matter, a family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs, go to the store, and live their lives. 

I think it is wrong for the government to decide who can marry. People should be free to choose who they love.

I have read that being gay may be related to biology. Some studies suggest it is partly in your genes.  This is different from things like growing up in a family with many siblings and no father, which does not make someone gay.

Besides the basic fairness of it, I think marriage should be a private matter. A man and a woman can get married without telling anyone. But gay couples face more problems. Their marriage makes news, even if they just want to be happy. It should not be a public issue.

The internet is a public place.  When you put something on the internet, anyone can see it. As an R.A., I have seen this.  If you post something online, people will see it and judge you. If you talk about hurting people or violence, someone will tell someone else. You can't put that out there. The internet is for everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see their messages.

The school may not get the message directly, but someone will tell them. They have to act if someone might be in danger. They can't ignore it. What if something bad happens?

It is hard to know what is serious and what is not. Sometimes people joke online, but it can be dangerous. For example, at my school, a situation happened where someone heard something. They told the school, and the school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made people worried. The person may have meant it as a joke, but it seemed serious.

When you share things online, you lose your privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't post it. You can't control what people think. 

School officials should not be friends with their students on social media. They should not look through their Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about something dangerous, they have to take it seriously.

They should not monitor phone calls or text messages unless they have a reason. If someone tells them about something, they have to act.

I think the war has lasted too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country have democracy. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. I also think the reasons for going to war were not good. It may have been about President Bush’s father’s problems with Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is a good reason. But now, I think the reason is unclear. It is like we fight just to keep fighting.

We showed our power in the first months. Now, the war has lasted for years. It is too long.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is good. But I think our reason for fighting has changed. 

The war should end. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should fix these problems instead of fighting.

We spend billions of dollars on war. This money could help people here. We need money for schools, roads, and health care.

We should help our own people instead of fighting a war that we do not need to be in.

Can I ask a question to make sure I understand?

It seems someone saw something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening. Is that right?

Okay.

I do not think looking at someone's internet profile is bad. If you put information on the internet, many people can see it.

On Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But, if you are friends, you give them permission to see it.

Anytime you put information online, many people might see it. If someone saw something helpful and stopped a bad thing, that is good.

It is hard to have someone always watching everyone's profiles to prevent problems. It would be wrong to only watch "bad" students.

It all depends on the situation. Was someone randomly looking or searching for something specific? I do not know.

I have a Facebook account. It worries me that people I do not know can see information about me. I saw a story about a man who easily found information about a girl online and talked to her. I would never meet someone like that.

Some people in my class message me on instant messenger, but I do not recognize their names. It is strange because they know my interests and schedule.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but I also want to connect with friends. It is hard to balance privacy and connection.

I only accept friends I know, but you never know who can see information.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. It seemed strange to me. I do not know how they can tell students what websites they can use.

I am against the Iraq War. Many people agree with me.  Most polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people around the world think it was a bad idea. This includes people in Iraq and even U.S. soldiers who are there. The war was a mistake from the start and leaving will be hard too.

There is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our way of life is not the same. The current government does not understand this. They think they can bring democracy to a place where it does not fit. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the bad things that might happen before we invaded Iraq.

Pulling out of Iraq will be difficult, but staying is also bad. The government has reasons for staying, but I do not agree.

I think we should leave as soon as possible. I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want us to leave within a year. They are the people we are trying to help, and they want us to go. Maybe they know best. If we ask them and they say we should leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong. At least we tried to listen to them.

Leaving will not make us heroes, but it will be better than what we are doing now.

I think gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. It depends on the type of work. 

For example, women may face a "glass ceiling." This means they may not be promoted to high-level jobs, even if they are qualified. This is because society has traditionally seen men as leaders in business.

Men can also face discrimination. For example, stay-at-home dads may be looked down on because society expects men to be the main breadwinners. 

In the fashion industry, men may be less respected, even if they are talented. This is because fashion is often seen as a feminine field.

Change takes time, but progress is being made.

More women are becoming CEOs and stay-at-home dads are becoming more accepted.  

People are starting to see that success is not limited by gender.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious, like a traffic ticket. It is not a crime like it used to be. This means people will not be arrested. They will just get a ticket.

Many people are worried about the future. Even if marijuana is not a crime, some jobs still might not hire people who have been cited for it.

This change saves the government money. It costs a lot to arrest, jail, and try people. 

Some places do not want to change the law because they think marijuana is bad. But in places where people are more open to change, it is okay. This money can be used for schools, older people, and people without homes.

Marijuana should not be sold everywhere. People should be careful. 

Some people worry about marijuana being sold in stores like cigarettes. People would smoke it everywhere. It is not yet normal to smoke marijuana. It can be awkward.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have bad effects on a person's life. Both have bad effects, but people react differently. Some people can use things in moderation, while others cannot.

I say yes.
Many things in the Catholic Church are old. 
It is good to follow traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules carefully.
Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics.
They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. 
My mom was a Catholic.
They could not marry in the Catholic Church.
This is not being kind to other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching.
But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them.
I feel like Catholic teachings tell you to do things, but how the Church acts goes against these teachings.
It is old-fashioned and they do not change.

I do not think this would change much.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think this would stop bad priests.
It is a different problem.

People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.
Allowing priests to marry would not stop this.

I am still thinking about this topic. I do not know if either side is right or wrong. This is a difficult problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. If marriage is a religious thing, the government should not care. People would not get special treatment from the government if they were baptized.

If two people are united, that is all that matters. The government should not care about the type of union.

If all states agree on a law, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban same-sex marriage is wrong. The constitution should not be changed for this.

It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home.

Being gay is a hard thing for me to understand.

I have gay friends.

I do not agree with this way of life.

But I think gay people should have the same rights.

I think each state should decide if gay marriage is legal.

I do not think it should be a big national problem.

Some states are run by Democrats.

Many states are run by Republicans.

Democrats like gay marriage.

If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel.

You chose to live there.

So you should respect their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people.

So I think gay marriage should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think each state should decide if they want gay marriage.

I do not think the President should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.

I think some things should be up to each state.

The President cannot live in every state.

He should not tell each state how to run itself.

I think a new President might change the law.

It will keep going back and forth.

It is better to let each state decide.

They will have to live with the decision.

My Space is a public thing. It is like a bulletin board for people to see.

If you post something on My Space, you must know that many people will see it, including school officials. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can still access it at home.

If the school officials can stop a school shooting, they have the right to see what is on My Space. Their job is to keep students safe.

However, if they use My Space just to find students doing things they are not allowed to do, that is an invasion of privacy.  

It is easier to express yourself in writing. I am careful about what I post online because I know it can come back to haunt me. Everything on the internet stays there forever.

When you are a student, you should not expect privacy on public websites.

If school officials find something on My Space that prevents a bad thing from happening, like a school shooting, then it is okay. They are trying to make the school a safe place.

Parents want to know their children are safe at school. School officials need to do what they can to keep students safe.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I wanted revenge. But now I am against it. We did not plan well.

We went in unprepared. It backfired. The people there fight each other. They do not need us. I do not care about them.

We went in looking for revenge. President Bush went in because people wanted it. He could not let them get away with it.

But, we did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. We were angry, not thinking clearly.

We did not create order. There was no unity. I do not think we can change them. They will always fight.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. We are hurting ourselves. We should leave.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. Many people are leaving the Church. I think this is because the Church does not accept many things. 

For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues to many people. The Church's views are very old. 

If the Church was more modern, it would not lose so many followers. Many people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church has the wrong ideas.

If you believe in abortion, you might not feel comfortable in a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think women can be priests. I also think priests should be allowed to marry.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should be free to marry who they love.  A person's sexual orientation is part of who they are. They do not choose it. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage should be legal. They say there is no good reason not to allow it.

Some people worry that gay couples are a threat to families. But they say it is different. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples, like property rights and health care.

If a gay partner is sick, they cannot visit or make medical decisions for their partner in the hospital. 

Studies show gay couples have happy relationships, just like straight couples.

Gay couples are not asking to be married in a church. They want a legal marriage certificate.

Some people say it is against their religion. But others say the government should not be involved in religion.

Gay couples want the same rights as everyone else. They want to be treated equally.

Some worry about how gay couples will raise children. But studies show children of gay couples do well.

It is important to remember that gay couples are just like straight couples in many ways. They love each other and want to build a life together.

The government should protect the rights of all people, including gay couples.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many medicines. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can have good uses for health.  

Many medicines people use are illegal without a doctor's order. This includes oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocet. These drugs are strong. Doctors use them to help people.  

People use marijuana for many reasons. Some use it to feel good. Others use it to help with pain. It is important to use drugs safely. 

Alcohol is legal but can be bad if used too much. Marijuana can also be bad if used too much.  

I think marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful how we start. We should not make it legal all at once.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If we change how people think about marijuana, they may use it safely.

The church has changed to fit the twenty-first century. It is not as strict as before.  

When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I always wore a cute dress, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there every week.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers that is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some people even come straight from the beach in their swimsuits.  

At the morning masses, people wear jeans and khakis. It used to be that everyone dressed up. Now, it is more casual.

That is the biggest change I have noticed.

As for other things, I don't know much about the church's politics.

Regarding the accusations against priests, I don't think these could have been prevented even if priests were allowed to marry.

Some married men become pedophiles. It is about the person, not their marriage status. Becoming a priest is a choice.

There are other religions where priests can marry. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they could choose a different religion.

I think pedophilia is genetic. People are born with these tendencies. It is not something they learn. A marriage cannot hide this.

I am upset about the Iraq war. After September 11th, many people felt scared. The Bush administration said Iraq was bad and connected to the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had dangerous weapons. This is not true. I think the Bush administration lied to the people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he was not sure about the evidence even when he spoke. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to people.

I think the Bush administration does not care about the Constitution. They want to be in control. The president wanted to go to war. His father's administration fought with Saddam Hussein. The president wanted to control Iraq's oil.

The war has gone on too long. If we leave now, Iraq could become very dangerous. A civil war could start. The UN and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. This might cause more problems. Iraq should be in control of its own government.

The government in Iraq is not strong. The Prime Minister does not have much power. Many groups want control. One group, led by Sadr, has many seats in the government. There are many problems.

I feel confused about the war in Iraq. It seems like it began as a way to punish Iraq for 9/11, but now it feels pointless. We are trying to build a democracy there, but it is a slow process. 

I worry that if we leave, Iraq will fall into chaos. But staying there also makes people angry and could make things worse. 

I also worry that the war is making our country look bad. It's like the Vietnam War, which many people consider a mistake. I feel bad for President Bush because this war might hurt his reputation. 

Many of my friends or family have children fighting in Iraq. I want them to be safe. But I also worry about the Iraqi people. They have suffered a lot. 

I don't know if there is a good solution. It seems like this war will continue for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make [the act] legal. I do not think a state should say it is legal. I think it is up to the churches. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear.  I think trying to make laws about this is against what the constitution says.  It is like trying to say the government knows better than the church.  

People who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's belief over another. Many Catholics and Christians are against [the act]. But I think the government should not decide what churches can and cannot say is wrong.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different religions in the United States. Even though some people want to change the constitution, I think it would be wrong. It would be the only change that limits people, not the government.

I do not think the government should be involved in this. The person pushing for this change only wants to limit [the act] because of his own beliefs.  He is picking one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide. 

I do not see why this change is needed. It will not help or hurt the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is a complex issue. 

I do not think the government was honest with the people about why we went to war. I believe they tried to link the war to the September 11th attacks, even though they were not really connected. The government used the fear and anger after September 11th to push for the invasion. The war began in 2003, two years after the attacks.

I am against war, especially preemptive strikes. I think the Iraq War is similar to the Vietnam War, and we should have learned from past mistakes. Many American soldiers have died in Iraq, and it has been a devastating loss.

The government removed the Iraqi government and did not plan for what would happen next. They did not realize the chaos and instability that would follow. The United States is trying to help build a democracy in Iraq, but it is a very difficult process.

It is like what happened in Vietnam. We tried to remove communists and promote democracy, but it was a long and hard fight. We cannot expect quick victories in these situations.

The government should have been better prepared for the challenges of war. We should have thought about all the possible outcomes before going in. The war has been going on for many years, and many American troops are still dying. We are still trying to train Iraqi forces to protect their own country.

The US government made it seem like the war would be short and successful, but it has been anything but. Building a democracy takes time and effort. It took a long time for the United States to become a strong democracy, with many struggles and conflicts along the way.

The US government should have been more honest with the people about the difficulties of war and the long-term commitment required.

It is hard to decide what to do now. We have been in Iraq for so long that leaving seems wrong. But the cost in lives and money is very high. We need to find a way to end the war peacefully and help Iraq build a stable future.

It is also important to consider why we went to Iraq in the first place. We said it was about weapons of mass destruction, but those were never found. We know that other countries, like North Korea, have weapons of mass destruction, but we are not attacking them.

It seems like the real reason for the war was oil.

I hope the war will end soon and there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice. It is something that science is showing us is likely biological, not just a social thing.  So, it seems unfair to take away rights from people because of something they cannot control. I think it is wrong.

I believe that government should not be involved in personal matters like this. It is a personal matter, a family matter. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like any other family. They walk their dogs, go to the store, and live their lives. 

I think it is wrong for the government to decide who can marry. People should be free to choose who they love.

I have read that being gay may be related to biology. Some studies suggest it is partly in your genes.  This is different from things like growing up in a family with many siblings and no father, which does not make someone gay.

Besides the basic fairness of it, I think marriage should be a private matter. A man and a woman can get married without telling anyone. But gay couples face more problems. Their marriage makes news, even if they just want to be happy. It should not be a public issue.

The internet is a public place.  When you put something on the internet, anyone can see it. As an R.A., I have seen this.  If you post something online, people will see it and judge you. If you talk about hurting people or violence, someone will tell someone else. You can't put that out there. The internet is for everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see their messages.

The school may not get the message directly, but someone will tell them. They have to act if someone might be in danger. They can't ignore it. What if something bad happens?

It is hard to know what is serious and what is not. Sometimes people joke online, but it can be dangerous. For example, at my school, a situation happened where someone heard something. They told the school, and the school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made people worried. The person may have meant it as a joke, but it seemed serious.

When you share things online, you lose your privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't post it. You can't control what people think. 

School officials should not be friends with their students on social media. They should not look through their Facebook pages. But if someone tells the school about something dangerous, they have to take it seriously.

They should not monitor phone calls or text messages unless they have a reason. If someone tells them about something, they have to act.

I think the war has lasted too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help another country have democracy. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. I also think the reasons for going to war were not good. It may have been about President Bush’s father’s problems with Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is a good reason. But now, I think the reason is unclear. It is like we fight just to keep fighting.

We showed our power in the first months. Now, the war has lasted for years. It is too long.

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is good. But I think our reason for fighting has changed. 

The war should end. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should fix these problems instead of fighting.

We spend billions of dollars on war. This money could help people here. We need money for schools, roads, and health care.

We should help our own people instead of fighting a war that we do not need to be in.

Can I ask a question to make sure I understand?

It seems someone saw something on the internet that stopped a bad thing from happening. Is that right?

Okay.

I do not think looking at someone's internet profile is bad. If you put information on the internet, many people can see it.

On Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But, if you are friends, you give them permission to see it.

Anytime you put information online, many people might see it. If someone saw something helpful and stopped a bad thing, that is good.

It is hard to have someone always watching everyone's profiles to prevent problems. It would be wrong to only watch "bad" students.

It all depends on the situation. Was someone randomly looking or searching for something specific? I do not know.

I have a Facebook account. It worries me that people I do not know can see information about me. I saw a story about a man who easily found information about a girl online and talked to her. I would never meet someone like that.

Some people in my class message me on instant messenger, but I do not recognize their names. It is strange because they know my interests and schedule.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but I also want to connect with friends. It is hard to balance privacy and connection.

I only accept friends I know, but you never know who can see information.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. It seemed strange to me. I do not know how they can tell students what websites they can use.

I am against the Iraq War. Many people agree with me.  Most polls show that 75 to 80 percent of people around the world think it was a bad idea. This includes people in Iraq and even U.S. soldiers who are there. The war was a mistake from the start and leaving will be hard too.

There is a big difference between the United States and the Middle East. Our way of life is not the same. The current government does not understand this. They think they can bring democracy to a place where it does not fit. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the bad things that might happen before we invaded Iraq.

Pulling out of Iraq will be difficult, but staying is also bad. The government has reasons for staying, but I do not agree.

I think we should leave as soon as possible. I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want us to leave within a year. They are the people we are trying to help, and they want us to go. Maybe they know best. If we ask them and they say we should leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong. At least we tried to listen to them.

Leaving will not make us heroes, but it will be better than what we are doing now.

I think gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It is not just a problem for women. It depends on the type of work. 

For example, women may face a "glass ceiling." This means they may not be promoted to high-level jobs, even if they are qualified. This is because society has traditionally seen men as leaders in business.

Men can also face discrimination. For example, stay-at-home dads may be looked down on because society expects men to be the main breadwinners. 

In the fashion industry, men may be less respected, even if they are talented. This is because fashion is often seen as a feminine field.

Change takes time, but progress is being made.

More women are becoming CEOs and stay-at-home dads are becoming more accepted.  

People are starting to see that success is not limited by gender.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious, like a traffic ticket. It is not a crime like it used to be. This means people will not be arrested. They will just get a ticket.

Many people are worried about the future. Even if marijuana is not a crime, some jobs still might not hire people who have been cited for it.

This change saves the government money. It costs a lot to arrest, jail, and try people. 

Some places do not want to change the law because they think marijuana is bad. But in places where people are more open to change, it is okay. This money can be used for schools, older people, and people without homes.

Marijuana should not be sold everywhere. People should be careful. 

Some people worry about marijuana being sold in stores like cigarettes. People would smoke it everywhere. It is not yet normal to smoke marijuana. It can be awkward.

Alcohol is worse for driving. But marijuana can have bad effects on a person's life. Both have bad effects, but people react differently. Some people can use things in moderation, while others cannot.

I say yes.
Many things in the Catholic Church are old. 
It is good to follow traditions. 
But it is also good to change.
Many Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules carefully.
Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics.
They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. 
My mom was a Catholic.
They could not marry in the Catholic Church.
This is not being kind to other religions.

We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching.
But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them.
I feel like Catholic teachings tell you to do things, but how the Church acts goes against these teachings.
It is old-fashioned and they do not change.

I do not think this would change much.
I think it would be good if priests could marry.
But I do not think this would stop bad priests.
It is a different problem.

People who hurt children would probably hurt children even if they were married.
It is wrong to hurt children.
Allowing priests to marry would not stop this.

I am still thinking about this topic. I do not know if either side is right or wrong. This is a difficult problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. If marriage is a religious thing, the government should not care. People would not get special treatment from the government if they were baptized.

If two people are united, that is all that matters. The government should not care about the type of union.

If all states agree on a law, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban same-sex marriage is wrong. The constitution should not be changed for this.

It is important to some people, but not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian home.

Being gay is a hard thing for me to understand.

I have gay friends.

I do not agree with this way of life.

But I think gay people should have the same rights.

I think each state should decide if gay marriage is legal.

I do not think it should be a big national problem.

Some states are run by Democrats.

Many states are run by Republicans.

Democrats like gay marriage.

If you live in a Democrat state, you know how they feel.

You chose to live there.

So you should respect their choice.

I think gay people should have the same chances as straight people.

So I think gay marriage should be legal, but each state should decide.

I think each state should decide if they want gay marriage.

I do not think the President should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.

I think some things should be up to each state.

The President cannot live in every state.

He should not tell each state how to run itself.

I think a new President might change the law.

It will keep going back and forth.

It is better to let each state decide.

They will have to live with the decision.

My Space is a public thing. It is like a bulletin board for people to see.

If you post something on My Space, you must know that many people will see it, including school officials. Even if they are not using the school's name, they can still access it at home.

If the school officials can stop a school shooting, they have the right to see what is on My Space. Their job is to keep students safe.

However, if they use My Space just to find students doing things they are not allowed to do, that is an invasion of privacy.  

It is easier to express yourself in writing. I am careful about what I post online because I know it can come back to haunt me. Everything on the internet stays there forever.

When you are a student, you should not expect privacy on public websites.

If school officials find something on My Space that prevents a bad thing from happening, like a school shooting, then it is okay. They are trying to make the school a safe place.

Parents want to know their children are safe at school. School officials need to do what they can to keep students safe.

I support the war at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I wanted revenge. But now I am against it. We did not plan well.

We went in unprepared. It backfired. The people there fight each other. They do not need us. I do not care about them.

We went in looking for revenge. President Bush went in because people wanted it. He could not let them get away with it.

But, we did not have a good plan. We did not know what to do. We were angry, not thinking clearly.

We did not create order. There was no unity. I do not think we can change them. They will always fight.

We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. We are hurting ourselves. We should leave.
